languages.text: "Что поделать, если только мне хватило ума быть само{mf|му|й} себе госпо{mf|дином|жой} и не стать марионеткой в руках чужих сил и догм? У вас у всех мозги промыты".
"And yet, I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to someone else's plaything or a slave to dogma."
languages.original_text: "Что поделать, если только мне хватило ума быть само{mf|му|й} себе госпо{mf|дином|жой} и не стать марионеткой в руках чужих сил и догм? У вас у всех мозги промыты".

traits.locale_text: "And yet I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to somebody else's plaything or a slave to dogmas."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

traits.locale_text: "And yet I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to somebody else's plaything or a slave to dogmas."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

traits.locale_text: "And yet, I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to somebody else's plaything or a slave to dogmas."

traits.locale_text: "And yet, I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to someone else's plaything or a slave to dogma."

traits.locale_text: "And yet, I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to someone else's plaything or a slave to dogma."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: « En effet, moi {mf|seul|seule} ai été assez {mf|intelligent|intelligente} pour prendre en main mon destin, au lieu de devenir le jouet d'un autre ou l'esclave des dogmes. »
languages.original_text: "And yet, I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to someone else's plaything or a slave to dogma."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, moi {mf|seul|seule} ai été assez {mf|intelligent|intelligente} pour prendre en main mon destin, au lieu de devenir le jouet d'un autre ou l'esclave des dogmes. »
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: «Pues mira, fui {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} lo bastante inteligente como para convertirme en señor{mf||a} de mi propio destino sin ser el juguete de nadie ni esclav{mf|o|a} de sus dogmas».
languages.original_text: "And yet, I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to someone else's plaything or a slave to dogma."

traits.locale_text: «Pues mira, fui {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} lo bastante inteligente como para convertirme en señor{mf||a} de mi propio destino sin ser el juguete de nadie ni esclav{mf|o|a} de sus dogmas».
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: “是啊，在所有人之中，只有我足够聪明。我把命运牢牢掌握在自己手里，没有成为别人的玩物，也没有沦为教条的奴隶。”
languages.original_text: "And yet, I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to someone else's plaything or a slave to dogma."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，在所有人之中，只有我足够聪明。我把命运牢牢掌握在自己手里，没有成为别人的玩物，也没有沦为教条的奴隶。”
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: 「それでも、私は己の運命の主となり、誰かの玩具となったり、ドグマの奴隷になったりしない程度の賢さは持ち合わせていた」
languages.original_text: "And yet, I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to someone else's plaything or a slave to dogma."

traits.locale_text: 「それでも、私は己の運命の主となり、誰かの玩具となったり、ドグマの奴隷になったりしない程度の賢さは持ち合わせていた」
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Und doch war nur ich gerissen genug, um {mf|zum Meister|zur Meisterin} meines eigenen Schicksals zu werden und mich nicht zum Spielzeug eines anderen oder {mf|zum Sklaven|zur Sklavin} von Dogmen machen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "And yet, I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to someone else's plaything or a slave to dogma."

traits.locale_text: "Und doch war nur ich gerissen genug, um {mf|zum Meister|zur Meisterin} meines eigenen Schicksals zu werden und mich nicht zum Spielzeug eines anderen oder {mf|zum Sklaven|zur Sklavin} von Dogmen machen zu lassen."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Sonuçta kendi kaderimin efendisi olabilecek kadar zeki olan ve başkasının kuklası veya inancımın kölesi olmayan bir tek benim."
languages.original_text: "And yet, I was the only one clever enough to become the {mf|master|mistress} of my own fate and not be reduced to someone else's plaything or a slave to dogma."
